competition_summary.context: Competition The markets for networking solutions for service providers, enterprise WLAN, video surveillance, microwave backhaul and machine-to-machine communications technology are highly competitive and are influenced by the following competitive factors, among others: • total cost of ownership and return on investment associated with the solutions; • simplicity of deployment and use of the solutions; • ability to rapidly develop high performance integrated solutions; • reliability and scalabil
